page.title: 03Games children play
page.content: We conducted a survey in our two local schools to find out what children played in the playground at break time. The under nines tended to make up their own games based on popular television programmes in which they would pretend to be characters from the programmes. Examples of this type of game are:{Knight Rider and A-Team. Over nine boys go for traditional games on the whole. They prefer to play{football, cricket, rounders or {tennis}at break. Girls often play catching games using a tennis ball. A popular game is{"elastics"}at the moment. In this game a large loop of elastic is stretched into a rectangle around two girls' legs, the aim being for another to jump onto the elastic, pinning it to the floor, and jump off again without getting in a knot!
